concept.title: Manage Content with a Pending Rights Request from App Content
concept.shortdesc: See and modify the assets in Livefyre with a pending rights request.

ol.li: Click on Library to access App Content.
Use the options in the Rights filter to choose a pending rights request status (Requested, Needs Review) for specific assets.
Change the Rights Request status. See for more on how to change Rights Request statuses in App Content.
